name: SNAB
headline: A global finance automation platform for complex multi-entityâ¦
description: Snab aims to automate & centralize access and management of global banking for complex business groups with multiple subsidiaries, and digitize their access to financial services.

founders.name: Gorka Aguirre, Founder
founders.description: Gorka Aguirre (CEO), has 6 years of experience doing Private Equity in New York, at a company that grew from almost zero to more than $2BN AUM during his period at the firm. Gorka's experience at different roles at the company includes 3 years supervising treasury of portfolio companies, becoming the root cause of starting Snab after suffering a continous inneficient business banking & B2B payments experience. Gorka holds two degrees in law and business administration and a masters in finance

Products
Everything you need to manage your organization 
Snab’s connected finance and operations automation solutions ensure your enterprise-grade organization increases visibilitiy and control over accounts payable, accounts receivable and billing, treasury management, and data analysis through our AI powered financial analyst
Accounts Payable  Electronic Invoicing  Treasury Management  AI Financial Analyst

Features 
Enterprise Controls and Functionalities, Made Simple 
Achieve seamless oversight and enhanced functionality with user-friendly tools, empowering your team to maintain compliance and efficiency without compromising on robust controls. 
![](https://i0.wp.com/snabfinance.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/snab-ia.png?fit=1081%2C701&ssl=1)
# AI
Harness the potential of AI to elevate your capabilities and streamline your processes for greater intelligence, efficiency, and automation
![](https://i0.wp.com/snabfinance.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/snab-global.jpg?fit=1080%2C700&ssl=1)
# Global
Seamlessly oversee global operations across all entities from one centralized platform and in multiple currencies.
![](https://i0.wp.com/snabfinance.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/snab-controls.jpg?fit=1080%2C700&ssl=1)
# Compliance
Ensure continuous compliance and security with automatic updates across multiple jurisdictions. Benefit from integrated compliance, and enterprise-grade controls for robust protection.
Industries
Deep industry expertise, tailored to your needs 
Real Estate 
Simplify vendor payments and tenant invoicing to enhance cash flow management and financial reporting. 
Energy & Infrastucture 
Manage large-scale project payments with automated workflows, supporting cost control and project tracking. 
Private Equity & Venture Capital

Privacy policy 
Cookies
We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits. By clicking “Accept All”, you consent to the use of ALL the cookies. However, you may visit "Cookie Settings" to provide a controlled consent.Additional information in our [Cookie Policy](https://www.snabfinance.com/<https:/snabfinance.com/cookie-policy/>). 
Reject AllCookie SettingsAccept All

#### Privacy Overview
This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the ...
Necessary 
Necessary
Always Enabled
Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-advertisement| 1 year| Set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin, this cookie is used to record the user consent for the cookies in the "Advertisement" category .  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics| 11 months| This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analíticas".  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional| 11 months| The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional".  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary| 11 months| This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary".  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-others| 11 months| This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other.  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance| 11 months| This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance".  
viewed_cookie_policy| 11 months| The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.  
Functional 
Functional
Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features. Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
pll_language| 1 year| The pll _language cookie is used by Polylang to remember the language selected by the user when returning to the website, and also to get the language information when not available in another way.  
Performance 
Performance
Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. 
Analytics 
Analytics
Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. 
Advertisement 
Advertisement
Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads. 
Others 
Others
Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
wpcom_highlander_3pc_check| session| No description  
wp_api| past| No description  
wp_api_sec| past| No description  
SAVE & ACCEPT

generated_description:
**Company Overview: SNAB**

Founded in 2021 and situated in Madrid, Spain, SNAB positions itself as a global finance automation platform tailored for complex business groups. With a lean team of six and backing from Y Combinator’s W22 batch, SNAB aims to streamline and centralize access and management of global banking for multi-entity organizations. Their mission is to digitize and optimize the financial services accessed by these intricate business networks.

**Mission and Approach:**
At its core, SNAB seeks to simplify financial operations across multiple subsidiaries, allowing organizations to manage their banking and financial processes more efficiently. The company leverages artificial intelligence to enhance operational effectiveness, offering enterprise-grade solutions that support accounts payable, accounts receivable, treasury management, and data analysis.

**Products and Solutions:**
SNAB’s offerings include:
- **Accounts Payable Automation**: Streamlining payment processes to enhance cash flow.
- **Accounts Receivable & Electronic Invoicing**: Implementing compliant invoicing practices across jurisdictions.
- **Treasury Management**: Providing real-time banking oversight for better financial control.
- **AI Financial Analyst**: Utilizing AI to extract and integrate document data effectively.

These modular solutions allow businesses to choose the components that best fit their needs, making it easier to adopt and scale the tools as required.

**Target Industries:**
SNAB caters to several sectors, including:
- Real Estate
- Energy & Infrastructure
- Private Equity & Venture Capital
- Financial Services

This industry-specific expertise enables SNAB to deliver tailored solutions that meet the unique regulatory and operational challenges of its clients.

**Market Position:**
With its cutting-edge technology and AI capabilities, SNAB is streamlining complicated financial workflows for large organizations—automating processes that traditionally consumed significant time and resources. The company's approach not only enhances efficiency but also ensures robust compliance and security measures are in place, appealing to highly regulated industries.

**Leadership:**
Tom Blomfield, a recognized name in the fintech space, serves as a Group Partner for SNAB, bringing valuable insights and experience to guide the company’s strategic direction.

**Conclusion:**
SNAB is making strides in the fintech landscape by tackling the complexities of multi-entity financial management. As businesses increasingly seek digital solutions for their global banking needs, SNAB stands out as a partner equipped to drive automation, efficiency, and intelligence across financial operations.

For more information, visit [SNAB's Website](https://www.snabfinance.com).
